data.name: 0000 (206.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Hey, Haruhi. Think of this as a funny story and hear me out.

data.name: 0001 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh?

data.name: 0002 (206.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think Koizumi's gained some kind of clairvoyance.

data.name: 0003 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I have no idea what you're trying to say...

data.name: 0004 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you talking about--saying he's got clairvoyance out of nowhere…

data.name: 0005 (206.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We just went to the music room to get the key, right--Koizumi and I?

data.name: 0006 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What of it?

data.name: 0007 (206.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, we were waiting for your arrival…

data.name: 0008 (206.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi confidently declared that you'd turn up straight away.

data.name: 0009 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then I arrived as he said?

data.name: 0010 (206.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah. Even I was a little surprised.

data.name: 0012 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon are you... stupid?

data.name: 0013 (206.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thanks a lot...

data.name: 0014 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's just intuition, you know? A fluke.

data.name: 0015 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nothing more than a guess.

data.name: 0016 (206.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think so too, but he said it with so much confidence…

data.name: 0017 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Argh, jeez--you're so hopeless. We're wasting so much time thanks to this stupid conversation.

data.name: 0018 (206.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It put Haruhi in a bad mood, but it at least looked like I made some time.

data.name: 0019 (206.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Even if I honestly felt a little pathetic...

data.name: 0020 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, Suzumiya. Have you already heard about Koizumi's clairvoyance?

data.name: 0021 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Clairvoyance? What are you on about?

data.name: 0022 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehehe--Not that it's really clairvoyance...

data.name: 0023 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But it surprised Kyon.

data.name: 0024 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What is it? Tell me.

data.name: 0025 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Apparently Koizumi said this after getting the key from the music room--

data.name: 0026 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: "Miss Suzumiya will be back at once."

data.name: 0027 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It seems like it was just a guess or a shot in the dark, but…

data.name: 0028 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But I actually turned up?

data.name: 0029 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's right. It surprised Kyon enough to make his eyes go perfectly round.

data.name: 0030 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ahh, so that's what it was. No wonder I thought he was pulling a weird face.

data.name: 0031 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Even just intuition can be really surprising if you guess correctly, right?

data.name: 0032 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Maybe next I should set something up to scare Kyon.

data.name: 0033 (206.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: D-don't go too over the top though…

data.name: 0034 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi has clairvoyance?

data.name: 0035 (206.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: That's what I heard.

data.name: 0036 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From who?

data.name: 0037 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Well, I don't need to ask, it was obviously Kyon.

data.name: 0038 (206.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: From Mikuru Asahina also.

data.name: 0039 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru said so too?

data.name: 0040 (206.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Ultimately, it wasn't clairvoyance, just intuition.

data.name: 0041 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …What do you mean? I don't get it at all...

data.name: 0042 (206.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Itsuki Koizumi has the details.

data.name: 0044 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So in other words, it was probably just an accident?

data.name: 0045 (206.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The probability is high.

data.name: 0046 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How absurd… Let's hurry on.

data.name: 0047 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Haha... Ahaha.

data.name: 0048 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's wrong, Koizumi? Did you find something funny?

data.name: 0049 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I didn't... Hahaha... I'm simply laughing as I recall something.

data.name: 0050 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We went to get the key to the music room earlier, of course.

data.name: 0051 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah, with Kyon.

data.name: 0052 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We were able to obtain it smoothly, but afterwards I said this--

data.name: 0053 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: "Miss Suzumiya will return right now."

data.name: 0054 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Me?

data.name: 0055 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I can personally confirm I said it out of the blue as a mere guess, but--

data.name: 0056 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: When you immediately appeared, his eyes went as wide as you can imagine.

data.name: 0057 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ahh--he was pulling a weird face, now you mention it.

data.name: 0058 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I was sure you weren't able to get the key, so I went to check.

data.name: 0059 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 実は、そんなやりとりがあったの ですよ。僕と彼の間でですが

data.name: 0060 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 本当に、ただのカンだったの？ あたしがすぐ現れる……って

data.name: 0061 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 予知能力です、と言った方がいいの でしょうね、盛り上げるためには

data.name: 0062 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: カンだとしても大したものだわ

data.name: 0063 (206.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: このカンを生かして、今回の怪奇 現象は、解き明かしてみせますよ

data.name: 0064 (206.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 頼もしい発言ね。期待してるわ
